#### `2acc984c8afd6b75dff809207aaa825cadfcac8daf4ecc13aff14e31fdef9fe5`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz.asc/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& gpg --verify php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xof php.tar.xz -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm php.tar.xz* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz.asc/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& gpg --verify php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xof php.tar.xz -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm php.tar.xz* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

#### `2acc984c8afd6b75dff809207aaa825cadfcac8daf4ecc13aff14e31fdef9fe5`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz.asc/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& gpg --verify php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xof php.tar.xz -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm php.tar.xz* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz.asc/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& gpg --verify php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xof php.tar.xz -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm php.tar.xz* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

#### `2acc984c8afd6b75dff809207aaa825cadfcac8daf4ecc13aff14e31fdef9fe5`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz.asc/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& gpg --verify php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xof php.tar.xz -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm php.tar.xz* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```

#### `2acc984c8afd6b75dff809207aaa825cadfcac8daf4ecc13aff14e31fdef9fe5`

```dockerfile
RUN buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libreadline6-dev \
		librecode-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& set -x \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz \
	&& curl -SL "http://php.net/get/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.xz.asc/from/this/mirror" -o php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& gpg --verify php.tar.xz.asc \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xof php.tar.xz -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm php.tar.xz* \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--with-curl \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-readline \
		--with-recode \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps \
	&& make clean
```
